instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.U7000: What is U7000? U7000 refers to the ISL6258 or ISL6259 charging IC on Macbooks from 2008-2012.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.PPV3V42_G3H: What is PPV3V42_G3H? This is a typo of PP3V42_G3H When you see PPV3V42_G3H, assume they meant to type PP3V42_G3H.
definitions.R7020: What is R7020? Current sense shunt resistor for the charger, the resistors between this and the ISL6259 should be proper rating or else machine will turn off the charger. Measuring pins 27/28 on ISL6259 should give you 20.02 ohms. .
definitions.R7021: What is R7021? Current sense resistor between charger current sense shunt resistor and ISL6259. When these resistors fail the ISL6259 cannot gauge how much current is being drawn from the charger, which will cause the ISL6259 to stop drawing power from the charger as a safety precaution. Symptoms are low voltage on PPBUS_G3H around 4v, quarter fan spin, or battery not charging..

threads.title: Macbook pro 13, 820 2879 b, Turn on only with batery
threads.message:
Hey guys, 
At first i have a problem with <SIGNAL>PPV3V42_G3H</SIGNAL>, because some liquid damage close to <CHIP>U5010</CHIP>. i clean up and 3v42 came back.. 
After i have a prob with =<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL>, only have 1.4v. 
I take the fuse F7040, and have 1.4v in the same sides(pin1 and pin2).
i already change <CHIP>U7000</CHIP> and capacitor <CAPACITOR>C7040</CAPACITOR>..
the board works fine only with battery.  

any ideas ?? 

cumps

threads.title: Macbook pro 13, 820 2879 b, Turn on only with batery
threads.message: Sense resistors <RESISTOR>R7021</RESISTOR>/22/51/52 or the traces connecting them to ISL and <RESISTOR>R7020</RESISTOR>/50.

threads.title: Macbook pro 13, 820 2879 b, Turn on only with batery
threads.message:
Sense resistors is fine, <RESISTOR>R7021</RESISTOR>/22 = 10ohm, 51/52 = 3 and 0.7 ohm.. Traces is ok too.. =( 

sometimes i get 12.6v unstable and then drop to 1.6v.. only turn on with battery and dont charg the battery...

threads.title: Macbook pro 13, 820 2879 b, Turn on only with batery
threads.message: Must be corroded trace in sense circuit. When PPBUS drops to 1.6V does 3V42 bus stay high?

threads.title: Macbook pro 13, 820 2879 b, Turn on only with batery
threads.message: ya, i have stable 3v42.. the traces around <CHIP>U7000</CHIP> appear to be well. if i let the charge on board PPBUS stay on 12V6, unstable but ok..

threads.title: Macbook pro 13, 820 2879 b, Turn on only with batery
threads.message: What is unstable? With a battery connected it should be stable.
